thread.title: Kelli Kaska
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Kelli Kaska

author: Kelli Kaska
title: Kelli Kaska
text: I was able to get next say delivery of er the phone. I was given a estimated time of arrival the day of delivery and the best part was that I could track the progress of the delivery. My mattress arrived in the estimate time frame and was set up easily and quickly.
